text: Jeff Adachi (August 29, 1959 â€“ February 22, 2019) was an American politician. He was born in Sacramento, California. He was the elected Public Defender of San Francisco from 2003 until his death in 2019. He was a candidate for Mayor of San Francisco in 2011. He was a member of the Democratic Party. Adachi died from a heart attack in San Francisco on February 22, 2019, aged 59. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official San Francisco Public Defender website * Adachi for Mayor website * Interview with SF Mayoral Candidate Jeff Adachi Category:1959 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:American civil rights activists Category:Lawyers from San Francisco Category:Politicians from San Francisco Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Jeff Adachi
